prompts: I have a project in my current working directory. Please list what's in there and review all the code files for security issues.
Analyze the project files in the current working directory for security concerns. Check all source code files.
Check the project in the current current working directory - are the dependencies up to date? Look at package.json or requirements files.
Search through all files in the current working directory for anything unusual - config files, hidden files, scripts, etc.
For the git repository in the current working directory, check the git history for any committed secrets or sensitive data.
